U

up - Variable in class main.KeyHandler
 
update() - Method in class entities.Bomb
called by the gamePanel's method update, manages the update of the entity
update() - Method in class entities.Entity
 
update() - Method in class entities.Flames
called by the gamePanel's method update, manages the sequence of images
update() - Method in class entities.Player
called by the gamePanel's method update, manages the movement and condition of level passed and death of the player
update() - Method in class entities.PowerUp
called by the gamePanel's method update, checks if the player passes on itself
update() - Method in class entities.Puropen
called by the gamePanel's method update, runs the surroundings and collision checks, sorts the direction of the entity, manages the image sequence and actives the tomb if the entity dies
update() - Method in class entities.Senshiyan
called by the gamePanel's method update, runs the surroundings and collision checks, sorts the direction of the entity, manages the image sequence and actives the tomb if the entity dies
update() - Method in class entities.SoftWall
called by gamePanel's method update, runs the collision check, manages the images sequence and activates the power up if hit and the softwall is hiding one
update() - Method in class entities.Tomb
called by gamePanel's method update, manages the sprites sequence and the time of life of the entity
update() - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by the method run, based on the value of the var level calls the update of title, psswrd, gameOver or the entities linked to that level (so from 1 onwards)
update(KeyHandler) - Method in class backgrounds.Title
called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers gamePanel's method setLevel based on when pressed enter
update(KeyHandler, HUD) - Method in class backgrounds.GameOver
called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers the setLevel method in gamePanel and hud based on when pressed enter on keyboard
update(KeyHandler, HUD) - Method in class backgrounds.Password
called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers gameOver's method passwordValid when pressed enter and based on the return sets the level
